column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////The croissant was a different story. You know in Ratatouille when Colette describes fresh bread to Linguini? A "symphony of crackle
column2: she says. She proceeds to hold the bread up to her ear and give it a gentle squeeze to demonstrate. Biting into the chocolate croissant sounded exactly the same. Flaky layers upon layers of delicate bread surrounding two squeezes of chocolate.
